review: ** **** ******** ** ** ********** friendly doctor who gives personal care .I have senstive tooth and i often visit her clinic because she gives appropriate treatment and advice. Me and my family have been visiting her for more than 10 years. I will now find it difficult if i ever have to change. I highly recommend Raahat Dental Clinic.
Dr Renu is very friendly it felt like I was talking to a friend rather than a doctor she told us about all the options to proceed with and recommended  the best one.
I m very old patient of Raahat clinic,My complete family dental care is done here including my mother in law 77,son 23, husband and myself.Doctors here r very competent and friendly.

I live in Australia and have been visiting Raahat Dental Clinic for all my dental treatment for the last 15 years. They have a complete dental set up with an In house cad cam lab. Highly specialised and well equipped with a strict sterilisation protocol. I highly recommend Dr Renu Bhargava and Dr Akshay Bhargava for their immense expertise and specialisation. They have been also prompt in answering any long distance query that I ever had üôè

I was in acute pain with so much swelling and pain. I had visited a lot of dentists. Dr. Renu Bhargava was kind and helpful. She has a soft hand . I am completely healed and I don't fear dental treatments now. I highly recommended Raahat Dental clinic
